Header: Food Colour Code system comes into effect
Content: A colour code system for solid food and semi-solid food will come into force today. Health Minister Rajitha Senaratne issued the relevant gazette on the 17th of last month. The system has been introduced to guide the people when selecting food to prevent non-communicable diseases. The system is expected to create an awareness in the public about, Sugar, Salt and Fat content in food. Accordingly it will be mandatory to have colour codes on solid and semi-solid food that will be produced after the first of next month.
